claim: Flublok contains 3x the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines, which has been linked to greater immunogenicity vs standard-dose flu vaccines.

extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This identifies RIV4 as the recombinant HA vaccine, which is the category Flublok falls under, setting up context for antigen content comparison.

extracted_evidence.quote: Flu zone Quad rival ent (San of i Pasteur) 0.5-mL PFS†† ≥6 mos†† 15 µg/0.5 mL IM
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This shows that standard-dose flu vaccines (such as Fluzone Quadrivalent) contain 15 µg of hemagglutinin (HA) per 0.5 mL dose, establishing the baseline for comparison.
